definitions.definition: The way a person holds and positions their body.
One's attitude or the social or political position one takes towards an issue or another person.
The position of someone or something relative to another; position; situation.
To put one's body into a posture or series of postures, especially hoping that one will be noticed and admired
definitions.example: If you're finished posturing in front of the mirror, can I use the bathroom now?

definitions.definition: To pretend to have an opinion or a conviction
definitions.example: The politicians couldn't really care less about the issue: they're just posturing for the media.

definitions.definition: To place in a particular position or attitude; to pose.
definitions.example: to posture oneself; to posture a model
